summary: Implements an inâ€‘memory mock of AWS EC2 Network Access Control Lists (NACLs) for the Moto library, defining objects for NACLs, their rule entries, subnet associations, and a backend that manages creation, deletion, description, default rule setup, rule manipulation, and association handling with proper validation and error handling.
business_intent: Allows developers to test code that interacts with EC2 network ACL APIs without contacting real AWS services, providing a faithful simulation of NACL behavior for unit and integration testing.
